backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing audit logging, user profiles, access control, ICP controller state, and various query and update methods for authorization and system initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of key frontend React components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and theme-aware CSS properties for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React application through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, role checks, view switching, initialization, and routing between dashboards or access-denied states.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when a user lacks permissions, offering login, principal display with copy support, and ICP-related diagnostic panels.
frontend/src/components/AuditLogDetailDi: Displays detailed audit log information including timestamps, action types, severity, and metadata in a scrollable dialog.
Shows the user's authentication state, principal ID, and backend connectivity status with copy and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/BroadcastConfigP: Manages external broadcasting settings, allowing users to enable alerts and configure an endpoint URL.
Provides a file editor with category switching, change tracking, apply/reset actions, and unsaved-change warnings.
frontend/src/components/DashboardViewSwi: Renders buttons to switch between security and ICP operations dashboards when allowed.
Guides users through deploying on the Caffeine platform with steps, notes, and a link to start deployment.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main app header with authentication controls, role‑based titles, theme switching, and optional dashboard view switching.
frontend/src/components/IcpConnectionPan: Displays ICP network connection status, canister info, and error alerts with a retry option.
frontend/src/components/IcpControllerMan: Manages ICP controller roles, allowing admins to grant or revoke principals with validation and confirmation.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsCatal: Provides a searchable, categorized catalog of ICP controls with import/export, edit, and reset functionality.
Renders a single ICP control input row with dynamic input types based on the control definition.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsPanel: Wraps and displays the ICP Controls catalog with a header and navigation anchor.
frontend/src/components/IcpMainnetDeploy: UI panel showing prerequisites and step-by-step instructions for deploying canisters to the ICP mainnet.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their display name using a profile mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeAlertPan: Displays recent critical or warning audit alerts and flagged users with real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/RootTerminalPane: Admin terminal allowing execution of registered commands, tracking history, and handling permissions and audit logging.
frontend/src/components/SecuritySummaryP: Calculates and displays 24-hour and 7-day security event statistics including critical events and failed logins.
frontend/src/components/SuperuserAuditPa: Superuser panel for exporting audit logs and flagged user data with audit recording and status handling.
frontend/src/components/TestActionsPanel: UI form for creating and submitting mock audit log entries with configurable action types and metadata.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: Displays flagged users and provides actions to flag, unflag, and remove users by principal ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Runs a lightweight query on the backend actor to report connection status and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardView.ts: Manages the selected dashboard view with session persistence and validation against allowed roles.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpControls.ts: Handles ICP control settings by merging URL, session, and defaults, and provides update functions for network, canister ID, and control values.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login and logout handling, and loads identities from storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, controller status, security status, and initialization via an ICP actor.
frontend/src/icp-controls/bindings.ts: Implements lookup, parse/serialize, validation, and session key helpers for ICP control definitions.
frontend/src/icp-controls/registry.ts: Defines the ICP control categories and a large registry of control definitions for configuration UI.
frontend/src/icp-controls/types.ts: Contains TypeScript types for ICP control categories, control definitions, and options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with audit log filtering, multiple management panels, and access checks.
frontend/src/pages/IcpOpsDashboard.tsx: Displays the ICP operations console with connection, auth status, controls, and terminal panels.
frontend/src/terminal/commandRegistry.ts: Exports the full terminal command registry composed of core commands.
frontend/src/terminal/coreCommands.ts: Defines core terminal commands like help, clear, and security role management with backend auditing and error handling.
frontend/src/terminal/icpControllerComma: Provides a restricted command set for ICP Controller users, including help, clear, and profile management with audit integration.
frontend/src/terminal/terminalGuards.ts: Implements shared helpers for auditing, error classification, authentication checks, and parsing of timestamps and enums.
frontend/src/terminal/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for terminal commands, context, outputs, and history entries.
frontend/src/utils/codeEditorStorage.ts: Manages localStorage-backed state for editable files, including loading, saving, applying changes, and tracking unsaved edits.
frontend/src/utils/icpControls.ts: Provides utilities for deriving ICP network defaults, validating canister IDs, and mapping network settings to labels and hosts.
frontend/src/utils/icpControlsImportExpo: Handles exporting, downloading, importing, validating, and reading JSON configurations for ICP Controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (query or hash), persist them in sessionStorage, retrieve them with fallback, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, animations, plugins, and layout settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, goals, architectural plans, issues, and tracked features for the security-role and ICP‑integration work.
